statements: DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE location = 'New York' AND disposal_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE waste_type = 'Hazardous Waste' AND quantity > 1000;
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE location = 'New York' AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE quantity > 1000 AND waste_type = 'Recyclables'
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalEvents WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01' AND location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM Waste_Disposal_Data WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' AND disposal_weight > 100;
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_name = 'City Dump';
